item.title: Blog: A case of the Business Registers (ONS)
item.description: This blog post was published on Valtech's team website and describes work completed at the Office of National Statistics (ONS) in Newport as part of the Statistical Business Register (SBR) Discovery. The project wrapped up at ONS on February 3rd 2017. The post has been modified for public consumption. Key links describing future work are included at the end of this post. Some background Broadly a business register keeps track of economic data, most importantly turnover, number of employees, sector, business ownership and some idea of the aggregation of the business group (i.
